article_title: Same Sex Marriage and Health Care
article_text:
Please enable Javascript to watch this video

Healthcare revisited.

The Supreme Court ruled to uphold a key piece of the Affordable Care Act has put Governor Bill Haslam`s Insure Tennessee health plan back in the news.

But are conservative lawmakers digging in their heels even more to fight Obamacare?

The Informed Sources weighed in on the Supreme Court`s ruling on same-sex marriage.
